original_title: Arpico Supermarkets Opens its 57th Branch in Piliyandala
original_body_lines: The Arpico retail chain has further expanded its extensive footprint in Sri Lanka by launching the 26th Arpico Daily Supermarket in Piliyandala, Mawiththara, on the 17th of February 2023. This new supermarket, which is the 57th Arpico Retail Outlet overall, offers a convenient shopping experience for the residents of Piliyandala and the thousands of people who pass through daily.

The newly opened Arpico Daily Supermarket at Mawiththara, Piliyandala, offers all your daily needs under one roof. Arpico Daily Supermarkets are a network of smaller, more accessible “friendly, neighborhood” outlets, that provide the best values and deals, along with plenty of convenience. The supermarket, as with all Arpico outlets, consists of diverse product categories such as fresh produce, Daily essentials, and households under its roof, Arpico Daily Mawiththara is truly a one stop with unmatched variety, quality and choice. All this with the superior service that Arpico is renowned for.
Customers can also enroll for the Arpico Privilege loyalty programme, which is the highest rewarding loyalty platform in Sri Lanka offering 01 point for every Rs 200 you spend.

With the addition of Arpico Daily Mawiththara, to its network, the Arpico retail chain now comprises of 22 Supercentres, 09 Superstores, and 26 Arpico Daily Supermarkets island wide. Arpico has been a trusted household name in Sri Lanka for over 90 years.
